title: Down Load: Namu Amida Butsu wa Ai no Uta
synopsis: An exciting cyberpunk romp directed by Rintaro with veteran animator Kanada Yoshinori about a genius hacker and a gang of hot-rodders.
voices: ['Seki, Toshihiko', 'Ishizuka, Unshou', 'Kakinuma, Shino', 'Katou, Seizou', 'Koyama, Mami', 'Kitamura, Kouichi', 'Futamata, Issei']
staff: [['Rintaro', ['Director', ' Script', ' Screenplay']], ['Mima, Masafumi', ['Sound Director']], ['Kanada, Yoshinori', ['Character Design', ' Key Animation']], ['Yaginuma, Kazuyoshi', ['Key Animation']]]
